text: ...But even my understanding of myself is hazy. Am I Shigaraki? Or All For One? Or Shimura, even?
When Ms. Star touched me, she believed me to be Tomura Shigaraki...
Her new rule for me didn't take hold because her understanding doesn't quite mesh with reality.
Only two targets at once, I suppose?! And what's her effective range? Would it work if she called my dog Mon by his name, "Mon"?
For targets without a sense of self, her one-sided understanding is enough to enforce the new rule!
When calling the name of a target with a sense of self, Ms. Star's understanding of the target's identity must align with its own.
He must have a way to get around attacks that hamper his breathing...
This irresistible urge to test out her rules...
What's gotten into me all of a sudden?
I've never been so on edge.
